metadata.synopsis: One of the waveservants, singing on the funeral. Won't talk to a player during the funeral, won't tell much after that too.After the Beastmaster quest is completed, the ceremony is no longer going on, so they have a different dialog then.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Go to CTY_Main_A2. Talk to one of the waveservants-246.957; 6.5; -264.804

0.speaker: Seawind Slow-Boat Drubella
0.context: InternalNodeContext: Interrupted while singing a funeral requiemNodeContext: Ecstatic

1.speaker: Seawind Slow-Boat Drubella
1.text: I wonder if the Wavemother will call me next...

2.speaker: Seawind Slow-Boat Drubella
2.text: May you, too, feel Umberlee's embrace one day.
2.context: NodeContext: Warmly (but it's actually a little sinister if you think about it)

3.speaker: Seawind Slow-Boat Drubella
3.text: Feel the joy of Umberlee lap against your soul!
3.context: InternalNodeContext: Interrupted while singing a funeral requiemNodeContext: Ecstatic
